line_1: Which the sun-shine and daylight forbids.
line_2: Ere our eyes are clos'd up in their lids,

line_1: E'en at that hour, CARE, tyrant CARE, forbids,
line_2: The dew of sleep to fall upon his lids;

line_1: And while the dreadful risque foreseen, forbids,
line_2: Can'st thou, the tear just trembling on thy lids,

line_1: And yet Content th' insidious fiend forbids —
line_2: Oh! she has torn the slumbers from my lids:

line_1: Which the sunshine and daylight forbids.
line_2: Ere our eyes are clos'd up in their lids,
